name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 5,518 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 116 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

Equip: Your attacks have a chance to call to the pact, exploding for 127,093 Shadow damage split between nearby enemies and increasing your Haste by 849 for 10 sec.

Your death breaks the pact, causing a violent explosion.
